website_summaries.verdict: A nice alternative to traditionally stitched blankets with similar effectiveness of others in its class.
pros: Stands out for honeycomb stitching that is both attractive and stylish
Available in several weights, sizes, and neutral colors
Suitable for calming sleeplessness, stress, and other concerns
cons: The beaded particles in the stuffing are detectable, which may be annoying to some users
Some blankets are a few inches shorter than advertised

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely PERFECT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this blanket! As an adult, I was using another smaller one that was 6lbs and seemed heavier. This one (7lbs) covers a twin bed and feels not heavy but JUST right. Its just the best! Thank you SO much for making these 100% cotton so affordable!!! This weight is great for many ages! There was no smells and felt clean and just made evenly and just the best. SO happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: DOUBLE CHECK MEASUREMENTS
customer_reviews.text: The measurement issue is my problem. Please double check!The blanket overall is of a very good quality. Doesn’t necessarily need a slip cover, what is pictured is exactly what I got
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work for me or my mom
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 94-year old mom to try. She has trouble sleeping at night. She tried it and said she didn't notice any difference in her sleep quality. I took the blanket and tried it myself for several nights. Like her, I didn't notice any improvement, if anything, I had worst quality sleep. While I liked the weight, it was too warm for our Hawaiian nights. Sent it back and received a refund with no questions or problems.
customer_reviews.author: Pineapple Gal

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas gift ever
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a Christmas gift for my niece and she loves it. She said she’s slept better every night since. Background info: she’s 19, constantly up and down and light sleeper. No more. Guess what her brother got for his birthday on 1/1/2020??
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Kaye Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend’s daughter who has trouble sleeping at night. She told me that it had improve the quality of her daughter’s sleep and that she wakes up less in the middle of the night due to stress and anxiety. I’m glad that I found this and that it helped!
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice comforter. When balled up it appear too heavy but when its fully spread out it give a nice feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift to help an anxious person
customer_reviews.text: My 93 year old mother is enjoying this blanket and my 14 year old disabled niece loves it too..
customer_reviews.author: kristie

customer_reviews.title: Zzzzzz......
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely helps my restless legs at night. I am an adult weighing 108 pounds, so I got the 7 pound blanket. It sometimes causes my feet to fall asleep, but otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sousanna

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My little guy who struggles with nightmares loves his blanket and its helped reduce his wake ups!
customer_reviews.author: jblair

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift & they said the blankets are The Best
customer_reviews.author: Castiel

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 6 year old grandsons and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Chevalier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blanket
customer_reviews.text: I love my blanket. I have PTSD and anxiety. I also have psychogenic non epileptic seizures. This product helps me immensely. I bought just the twin because I’m the only one who needs it and it’s perfect as a lap blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Wash on cold gentle and hang to dry. My daughter loved it but my grandson even more so we had to buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Sweitzer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift. He opened it and put it on. Immediate comfort.
customer_reviews.author: jim Elder

customer_reviews.title: making a difference
customer_reviews.text: the toddler I purchased this for is now sleeping better and calmer during the day
customer_reviews.author: Conitha

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising: NOT 100% cotton
customer_reviews.text: The blanket has "fiberfill", which is synthetic (aka plastic). To me, if something is 100% cotton, the means it is 100% cotton and not a cotton cover filled with plastic fiberfill.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, just didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: This blanket quality was great. Very well made. Unfortunately it didn't work for me. The weight was too heavy so I had to return it. I wished it would have worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

product_meta.title: YEMYHOM 100% Cotton Weighted Blanket Kids Bed Heavy Blankets for Great Sleeping (36"x48" 5 lbs, Blue)
feature_bullets: Tips: the Weighted Blankets and Duvet Cover Are Sold Separately. We Recommend to Buy Weighted Blankets Together With Yemyhom Duvet Cover, So That You Just Need to Wash the Duvet Cover During Usage

HONEYCOMB: The original Honeycomb stitching design weighted blankets, different from other brands weighted blankets on Amazon. YEMYHOM Upgraded Honeycomb stitching structure is MORE Stable, MORE Comfortable, and MORE Beautiful.30% More beads and soft fiberfill are evenly sewn inside, not only looks nice, but prevents the fill from shifting during the night ensuring a comfortable sleep

SIZE & WEIGHT: 36"x48" 5lbs, Suitable for 30-70lbs kids. Please choose the blanket that weighs about 10% of your body weight + or - depending on individual preference. Recommend 36''x48'' for Twin size bed. YEMYHOM weighted bed blanket is designed to surround your body comfortably, so the idea blanket size don't exceed the size of the bed

MATERIAL: Comfort is a key ingredient of the YEMYHOM weighted blankets. Our blanket is made of 100% Cotton fabric, breathable, comfortable and skin-friendly. 30% More beads are evenly distributed in each pockets and perfect adaption to our body. Super soft odorless fiberfill are filled inside to prevent movement and noise, provide soft and warmth while you're resting

WELL-MADE: With 10 Years of textile production experience, YEMYHOM carry out the highest standards of quality control for the heavy blanket. Exquisite three-dimensional quilting and edging technology, prevent the leakage of glass beads, makes the weight blanket more durable. With strong corner loops, the blanket can be secured to your duvet cover firmly

GIFT IDEA: YEMYHOM weight blanket not only can be used at sleep, but also can be used while reading, relaxing, laping, watching TV on couch. It is a breathable blankets and throws that can be used in Spring, Summer, Autumn and Winter. A great gift idea for families and friends on Birthday, Christmas, New year, holiday. Perfect choice for both adults and kids
